Headline: #24 Wentworth Temporary Northbound Reroute near 43rd/LaSalle
ShortDescription: Northbound 24 Wentworth buses are temporarily rerouted via LaSalle, 43rd, State, 39th and LaSalle: due to, street blockage near 43rd/LaSalle.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #24 Wentworth buses are temporarily rerouted via LaSalle, 43rd, State, 39th and LaSalle: due to, street blockage near 43rd/LaSalle.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
